description:
This AOC unlocks the Heritage of Arreat transmog, the Diablo II-themed Barbarian transmog for Diablo® III as a pre-order bonus.

* Requires Diablo III. Diablo III is rated M (Blood and Gore, Partial Nudity, Violence, Users Interact) by the ESRB. The transmog will only be available in-game in Diablo III when Diablo II: Resurrected launches on September 23, 2021 at 8am PT.
name: Diablo® III: Heritage of Arreat Transmog AOC
